Merchandising Administrator/Specialist $20HR

Are you looking for a full-time position where you will receive company and colleague support, training, and a competitive compensation? You're in the right place!

We are seeking a motivated, professional, and courteous Merchandising Administrator/Specialist.

Our organization offers competitive compensation and benefits, a wonderful workplace culture, continued career growth and advancement opportunities!

Location: Hoffman Estates

Hours: 8am-5pm

Job Responsibilities:

  • Monitor the day to day feedback of the merchandising team to ensure established quality standards are maintained
  • Serve as a link of communication between field teams and corporate
  • Communicate exceptional performance to appropriate team members
  • Analyze and deliver progress reports
  • Identify and document opportunities for process improvement
  • Partner with teams (account managers, merchandising, marketing, store operations, IT) as needed to develop action plans to improve sales performance and / or customer service levels
  • Coordinate with other company departments as needed to implement and maintain quality control processes and training
  • Monitor and assist with special projects
  • Proactively manage changes in project scope and identify potential issues

Job Requirements:
  • 2+ years of experience supporting within one or multiple of the following:
  • Retail Management
  • Space Planning
  • Merchandising

Perks:
  • Paid Training
  • Benefits effective at 90 days
  • Growth potential within the company
